Gauge.Name: MFDX2 - ALL SCREENS
Gauge.Author: Herbert Pralle
Gauge.Macro: 3 (>L:MFDX2 mode,enum) 6 (>L:MFDX2 MAP Zoom,enum) (A:Fuel total quantity weight,pounds) (>L:Fuel actual quantity,pounds)

Shift.Value: (A:GPS GROUND TRUE TRACK,radians) (A:gps ground true heading,radians) - sin 60 *
(A:Vertical speed,feet per minute) (A:Ground Velocity, knots) 100 * / atg rddg

(A:Autopilot heading lock dir,degrees) (A:Plane heading degrees gyro,degrees) - -180 < if{ (A:Autopilot heading lock dir,degrees) (A:Plane heading degrees gyro,degrees) - 360 + } els{ (A:Autopilot heading lock dir,degrees) (A:Plane heading degrees gyro,degrees) - 180 > if{ (A:Autopilot heading lock dir,degrees) (A:Plane heading degrees gyro,degrees) - 360 - } els{ (A:Autopilot heading lock dir,degrees) (A:Plane heading degrees gyro,degrees) - } }

(A:NAV1 OBS,degrees) (A:Plane heading degrees gyro,degrees) - -180 < if{ (A:NAV1 OBS,degrees) (A:Plane heading degrees gyro,degrees) - 360 + } els{ (A:NAV1 OBS,degrees) (A:Plane heading degrees gyro,degrees) - 180 > if{ (A:NAV1 OBS,degrees) (A:Plane heading degrees gyro,degrees) - 360 - } els{ (A:NAV1 OBS,degrees) (A:Plane heading degrees gyro,degrees) - } }

%((A:Airspeed select indicated or true,knots) 999 min 100 % 10 / flr )%!1d!

%((A:Radio Height,feet) 2000 < if{ 0x00FFFF } els{ 0x00FF00 })

(A:Autopilot flight director bank, degrees) (A:Attitude indicator bank degrees, degrees) -

Rotate.Value: (A:Autopilot heading lock dir,radians) (A:Plane heading degrees gyro,radians) -

Element.Visible: (A:NAV1 signal, number) abs 10 > (A:GPS drives nav1, bool) ! &&

(A:HSI CDI needle valid, bool) if{ (A:HSI CDI needle, number) } els{ 0 }

FormattedText.String: %((A:PARTIAL PANEL HEADING,bool))%{if} --%{else}%(360 (A:Plane heading degrees gyro, degrees) dnor near d 0 == ?)%!03d!
%((A:NAV1 signal,number) abs 10 >)%{if}%((A:NAV1 DME,nmiles) 100 >=)%{if}%((A:NAV1 DME,nmiles))%!d!%{else}%((A:NAV1 DME,nmiles) abs)%!2.1f!%

Element.Visible: (A:NAV1 signal, number) abs 10 > (A:GPS drives nav1, bool) ! &&

FormattedText.String: %((A:GPS drives nav1, bool))%{if} %{else}%\n%((A:HSI CDI needle valid, bool) (A:HSI GSI needle valid, bool) &&)%{if}% APR%\n%((A:NAV1 LOCALIZER,degrees) (A:NAV1 MAGVAR,degrees) + dnor d near)%!03d!%

%((L:CNCP adf mode,bool) 1 == (A:ADF signal:2, number) 10 > &&)%{if}%ADF%\n%((A:ADF ident:2, string))%!s!%{else}%((L:CNCP adf mode,bool) 0 == (A:ADF signal:1, number) 10 > &&)%{if}%ADF%\n%((A:ADF ident:1, string))%!s!%
%((A:NAV2 signal, number) abs 10 >)% V2%\n%D %((A:NAV2 dme,nmiles) s0 0 >=)%{if}%(l0 100 >=)%{if}%(l0)%!d!%{else}%(l0)%!0.1f!%\n%((A:NAV2 ident,string))%!s!%
%((A:GPS WP DISTANCE,nmiles) 100 <)%{if}%((A:GPS WP DISTANCE,nmiles))%!3.1f!%{else}%((A:GPS WP DISTANCE,nmiles))%!d!%{end}% nm%

%((A:GPS POSITION LAT,degrees) 0 >)%{if} N%{else}% S%{end}%((A:GPS POSITION LAT,degrees) abs flr)%!d!%° %((A:GPS POSITION LAT,degrees) abs 10000 * 10000 % 100 / 0.6 *)%!2.2f%' %\n%((A:GPS POSITION LON,degrees) 0 >)%{if} E%{else}% W%{end}%((A:GPS POSITION LON,degrees) abs flr)%!d!%° %((A:GPS POSITION LON,degrees) abs 10000 * 10000 % 100 / 0.6 *)%!2.2f%' %

Area.Click: (L:MFDX2 MAP Zoom,enum) 24 < if{ (L:MFDX2 MAP Zoom,enum) 1 + (>L:MFDX2 MAP Zoom,enum) }
(L:MFDX2 MAP Zoom,enum) 0 > if{ (L:MFDX2 MAP Zoom,enum) 1 - (>L:MFDX2 MAP Zoom,enum) }
(M:Event) 'LeftSingle' scmp 0 == if{ 1 (>L:MFDX2 b1,bool) @Button1 } (M:Event) 'Leave' scmp 0 == if{ 0 (>L:MFDX2 b1,bool) }
(M:Event) 'LeftSingle' scmp 0 == if{ 1 (>L:MFDX2 b2,bool) @Button2 } (M:Event) 'Leave' scmp 0 == if{ 0 (>L:MFDX2 b2,bool) }

Mouse.Macro: (L:MFDX2 mode,enum) 2 == if{ (L:MFDX2 MAP mode,enum) 3 == if{ 0 (>L:MFDX2 MAP mode,enum) } els{ (L:MFDX2 MAP mode,enum) 1 + (>L:MFDX2 MAP mode,enum) } } els{ 2 (>L:MFDX2 mode,enum) }

Area.Click: (M:Event) 'LeftSingle' scmp 0 == if{ 1 (>L:MFDX2 b3,bool) @Button3 } (M:Event) 'Leave' scmp 0 == if{ 0 (>L:MFDX2 b3,bool) }

Mouse.Macro: (L:MFDX2 mode,enum) 3 == if{ 4 (>L:MFDX2 mode,enum) } els{ (L:MFDX2 mode,enum) 4 == if{ 5 (>L:MFDX2 mode,enum) } els{ 3 (>L:MFDX2 mode,enum) } }

Area.Click: (M:Event) 'LeftSingle' scmp 0 == if{ 1 (>L:MFDX2 b4,bool) @Button4 } (M:Event) 'Leave' scmp 0 == if{ 0 (>L:MFDX2 b4,bool) }
(M:Event) 'LeftSingle' scmp 0 == if{ 1 (>L:MFDX2 b5,bool) @Button5 } (M:Event) 'Leave' scmp 0 == if{ 0 (>L:MFDX2 b5,bool) }

(M:Event) 'LeftSingle' scmp 0 == if{ 2 (>L:MFDX2 b8,bool) @Button8dn } (M:Event) 'Leave' scmp 0 == if{ 0 (>L:MFDX2 b8,bool) }
